title: Vikram Veda first look: Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi’s combo will give you goosebumps
text:
Akshay Kumar's ex-girlfriends Shilpa Shetty Kundra and Raveena Tandon bond at the Satyug event! 
Ever since fans got to know, two powerhouses of talent – R Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi are coming together they have been giddy with excitement! After all it’s quite a killer combination. And now the makers have only added to buzz by releasing the first look of Vikram Veda – their upcoming project. The poster features Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi on equal footing indicating both are going to play powerful roles. The monochrome theme further adds to the gangsta-cop theme. Yes, in this film we will see Madhavan play a cop, while Vijay will be playing the bad ass gangsta. Game face on! The film is reportedly a modern take on the mythological tale – Vikram Aditya. Madhavan’s lean look for this film has been garnering a lot of praise, as for Vijay’s transformation it has taken fans much by surprise. His salt n pepper look and his worked upon bulky exterior adds the perfect touch to his gangster avatar. The film also stars Shraddha Srinath and Varu Sarath.It was in November last year when the news of these two collaborating came up. Nothing was finalised back then, but both had reportedly loved the script. Now aren’t we glad, both gave their nod for this exciting project! So how did you like the first look?
